IX.iii.2.A.4.c
.
When Review and Confirmation of Nursing Facility/Medicaid Status Is Required
When a current-law pension beneficiary who has neither spouse nor child is residing in a nursing facility, but not at VA expense
determine if the
nursing facility is Medicaid approved, and
beneficiary is covered by a Medicaid plan for services furnished by the nursing facility, and
confirm the date the beneficiary was admitted to the nursing facility.
title: M21-1, Part IX, Subpart iii, Chapter 2, Section A - Pension Reductions for Medicaid-Covered Nursing Facility Care
citation: Part IX, Subpart iii, Chapter 2, Section A
